alert.note: Alert for City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:27PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR ...THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF NORFOLK...THE NORTH CENTRAL CITY OF CHESAPEAKE AND THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 226 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Virginia Wesleyan University, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Virginia Beach around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Greenbrier, South Norfolk, Bayside, Oceana, Rudee Heights, Portlock, Princess Anne Plaza, North Virginia Beach, Oceana NAS and Gallups Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
